verses.text: Help, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* godly man ceaseth; \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* faithful fail \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* children \w of|strong="H4210"\w* men.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* speak vanity \w every|strong="H3068"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w neighbour|strong="H1121"\w*: \w with|strong="H3068"\w* flattering lip, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* double heart, \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* speak.

\w The|strong="H1696"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* cut \w off|strong="H7453"\w* all \w flattering|strong="H2513"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*, \w the|strong="H1696"\w* tongue \w that|strong="H3820"\w* \w speaketh|strong="H1696"\w* great \w things|strong="H2513"\w*:

\w Who|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* prevail; \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* own: \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w over|strong="H3068"\w* us?

\w For|strong="H4310"\w* \w the|strong="H1396"\w* spoiling \w of|strong="H8193"\w* \w the|strong="H1396"\w* poor, \w for|strong="H4310"\w* \w the|strong="H1396"\w* sighing \w of|strong="H8193"\w* \w the|strong="H1396"\w* needy, now \w will|strong="H4310"\w* I arise, saith \w the|strong="H1396"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; I \w will|strong="H4310"\w* set him \w in|strong="H8193"\w* safety at \w whom|strong="H4310"\w* they puff.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* words \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* pure words; \w as|strong="H3068"\w* silver tried \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* furnace \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* earth, purified seven times.

Thou shalt keep \w them|strong="H3068"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, thou shalt preserve \w them|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* generation \w for|strong="H3068"\w* ever.

\w The|strong="H8104"\w* wicked walk \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w every|strong="H1755"\w* side, \w when|strong="H3068"\w* vileness \w is|strong="H3068"\w* exalted \w among|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* sons \w of|strong="H3068"\w* men.
